RESPONSE TEXT: Well, Gilda Broscoe and Keith McKinney were our first investors. They are both movie stars with very storied careers.
Santiago Avida is a world renowned painter, he joined us shortly after Gilda invested as he was working on a series of paintings of her at the time.
Bert and Julianna Riggs are our largest investors in the hotel, holding as large a portion as the other combined.
Mrs. Riggs comes from old money, lots of investments in natural resources. Mr. Riggs was a researcher for General Atomics on the Robobrain project.
